subtitle.Text: This is our old timey record that we got from Archive.org, source of all good things. It’s by Adrian Rollini when he was with apparently ‘The Tap Room Gang’.
The song is entitled ‘Got a Need for You’ in case you can’t read it, which you should be able to read it, and the duck I found on the internet.
The - Adrian Rollini was, I got into him when I was on BioShock 2 and helping source the soundtrack for that and I did a lot of listening to 40’s big band stuff,
and Adrian Rollini was one of the ones that I really liked, and so it was cool to be able to revisit that.
